title: In which order should a person read all the books by IM Jeremy Silman? - Quora

response.answer_text: Jeremy Silman is an excellent author of many chess books and chess articles. There are 5 books by Jeremy Silman that are highly valuable for an improving player like me. I think the perfect order in which one should read these books is:- The Amateur’s MindThe Complete Book of Chess StrategyHow to Reassess Your ChessThe Reassess Your Chess WorkbookSilman’s Complete Endgame Course Thanks… ✍Ajit Kumar Sahoo

I know that Silman is a stronger chess player than I am or have ever been. Nevertheless I think noone should study his books unless they do not mind hitting a tough barrier at the level of a decent club player.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Ajit Kumar Sahoo
